summary: This spell increases your carry weight by 100
descriptionHtml:
Update: Thanks to SteelChi there is now working feather spells that you can buy from mages! Check out his mod @ http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4710

I was tired of having to buy potions or depend on enchanted items all the time to increase my carry weight. And have been unable to find a mod with this type of spell. So I made this simple spell with skyedit for myself, and decided to upload it here for others to use. I am having issues getting a buyable spelltome version in game. So for now you have to use the console command 

\"Player.addspell 1C001000\".

To install this just place the .esp into your Skyrim Data folder \"C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\" and activate the plugin. 

If for some reason the above code is not working open the console ~ and type \"help pack 0\" without quotes and use the page up key until the spell is listed.
author: 680i ba1

files.name: Pack Mule 1_01
files.changelogHtml: Made the spell a bit less costly (magicka) so that players at any lvl can use
